entities.name: ginn
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as smiling at her and saying 'Thanks'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as sitting down and being stared at by Luna.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as chuckling and stowing trunks with Harry.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig's cage is mentioned as being stowed in the luggage rack.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as watching Harry over her upside-down magazine and staring at him.

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: The Quibbler is mentioned as the name of Luna's magazine.

relationships.description: Luna stared at Harry without taking her eyes off him.
Ginny spoke to Luna and asked if she had a good summer.
Neville sat down with Harry in the same carriage.
Luna spoke to Neville and said 'And I don't know who you are.'
